divs: Sighting Detailsufo was like a star shape bright light it came from the south going north to north east.i live near a small airport hoffmans avaiation.there was three small planes in the area and this ufo came right inbetween all of them,there is no way for the pilots to mis the ufo it came close to all of them, i have a big flash light and shined my light on it while it was in between all the planes not to mention the jets that were flying at a high altitude, then the ufo took off to the east and the more it went the faster it got til it dimmed out way out to the east,,im outside sky watching, im out almost eerynight and lately since its been colder out the ufos been coming down closer to roof tops.this ufo went slow, i dont have a video camera but ive been seeing alot of ufos above my house
Summary: saw it come from the south of me going north east
